"From each according to their ability, to each according to their need." - Karl Marx
"It is a miracle that curiosity survives formal education." -Albert Einstein
"Being able to break security doesn’t make you a hacker anymore than being able to hotwire cars makes you an automotive engineer." -Eric Raymond
"Television is about watching a life instead of having one." - Beth Mazur
“Jellyfish are 97% water or something, so how much are they really doing? Just give them another 3% and make them water. It’s more useful” - Karl Pilkington
